title: Opinion: 4 questions to understand the costs of ‘medical freedom’
description: The choice that one person makes not to vaccinate has real costs — financial and otherwise — for their neighbors.
content: The choice that one person makes not to vaccinate has real costs — financial and otherwise — for their neighbors.
